metadata.title: CVE-2017-16909 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An error related to the "LibRaw::panasonic_load_raw()" function(dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.6 can be exploited tocause a heap-based buffer overflow and subsequently cause a crash via aspecially crafted TIFF image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16909` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.2
libraw15 - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.1-1ubuntu0.2').
ufraw package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
